title: GUADEC 2024 Conference Will Be Held in Denver for the GNOME 46 Desktop
description:
GUADEC 2024 conference will take place between July 19-24 in Denver, Colorado, USA, where the GNOME devs will talk about and plan the new features of the upcoming GNOME 46 desktop environment series.

The post GUADEC 2024 Conference Will Be Held in Denver for the GNOME 46 Desktop appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Zorin OS 17 Released with Quick Settings Menu, Spatial Desktop Effects, and More
description:
Zorin OS 17 distribution is now available for download with Quick Settings and Spatial Desktop effects, based on Ubuntu 22.04.3 LTS.

The post Zorin OS 17 Released with Quick Settings Menu, Spatial Desktop Effects, and More appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: QEMU 8.2 Released with Virtio-Sound Device, RISC-V KVM AIA Support
description:
QEMU 8.2 open-source virtualization software is now available for download with a new virtio-sound device, new virtio-gpu rutabaga device, and many other changes.

The post QEMU 8.2 Released with Virtio-Sound Device, RISC-V KVM AIA Support appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
